10: Higher state
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Higher state: start
10_s2: Upper state: setting
10_s3: Upper state: 2nd start
10_s3_e0: [General] Logic group flag setting
10_s3_e1: [General] Logic group flag setting
10_s4: Area start judgment_SubState
10_s5: [LIB] Start animation release setting_Two-handed sword start_SubState
10_s6: [LIB] Start animation release setting_bow start_SubState
10_s7: First contact action_SubState
10_s8: Sub: Equipment switching: Near to far switching _SubState
10_s9: [LIB] General-purpose: Upper (normal) _SubState
10_s10: Sub: Equipment change: Far ⇒ Near switch _SubState
10_s11: [LIB] Search enemy: General purpose _SubState
10_s12: Navi point move_SubState
x12: Area activation judgment
x12_s0: Start state
x12_s1: Area & FC judgment: start
x12_s2: Area & FC judgment: Waiting for area
x12_s3: No target
x12_s4: End state_Two-handed sword activation
x12_s5: End state_no target
x12_s6: End state_bow activation
x13: First contact behavior
x13_s0: Start state
x13_s1: Upper logic: FC start
x13_s1_e0: [Attack] Switch weapons
x13_s1_e1: [General] lower-level state map switching
x13_s1_e2: [Operation] Lock on
x13_s2: Upper logic: waiting for FC
x13_s3: End state
x14: Sub: Equipment switching: Near to far switching
x14_s0: Start state

x14_s4: Switch Equipment: End

x14_s4_e2: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x14_s5: End state_Switch to long range weapon

x16: Navi point move

x0: [LIB] General-purpose: upper (normal)
x0_p0: Sound tracking switch
x0_p1: Maximum search distance
x0_p2: Search priority
x0_s0: Start state
x0_s1: Top: Start setting
x0_s1_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x0_s1_e1: [Movement] Movement prediction accuracy setting
x0_s1_w0: [Action] Clear activation state reset flag
x0_s1_w1: [Search] Last sighting information overwriting
x0_s2: Top: Behavior branch
x0_s3: [LIB] Top: Target action: Visual recognition _SubState
x0_s4: [LIB] Top: Target action: Disappearance_SubState
x0_s5: [LIB] Top: Target action: Invisible_SubState

x0_s10: [LIB] Top: Targetless action_SubState
x0_s11: [LIB] Upper: generator feedback_SubState
x0_s12: End state

x1_s0: Start state
x1_s1: Start animation cancellation: Start

x1_s2_e0: [Action] Cancel activation state
x1_s3: Start animation cancellation: Start state setting
x1_s3_e0: [Search] Overwrite the generator position with the current position
x1_s4: End state

x2_p1: Search priority
